data.name: Come
data.description: Purpose: to signal your dog to come back to you, keeping your pup out of trouble.

data.name: Down or Lie Down
data.description: Purpose: to calm down an excited dog and address some dog's behavioural issues.

data.name: Wait
data.description: Purpose: to train your dog not to move or wander.

data.name: Sit-Stay
data.description: Purpose: to calm your dog down and keep them self-controlled.
